smc:pubsubIP.name: monitor
smc:pubsubIP.comment: Subscribe to Planning Request monitoring. Monitoring events are published whenever a Planning Request is submitted, updated, deleted, or some Planning Request Status changes. This method notifies about Planning Request changes that match the given filter.

smc:requestIP.name: submitPlanningRequest
smc:requestIP.comment: Submits a Planning Request. Provider does not have to process it immediately. Provider assigns a unique Identifierto the Planning Request. Subsequent modifications and inquiries about the Planning Request can be done using that ID. Once submitted, the Planning Request's status is SUBMITTED. SUBMITTED does not mean that the PR has been validated

smc:submitIP.name: updatePlanningRequest
smc:submitIP.comment: Updates the Planning Request by ID

smc:submitIP.name: removePlanningRequest
smc:submitIP.comment: Removes a Planning Request by ID

smc:requestIP.name: getPlanningRequest
smc:requestIP.comment: Gets a Planning Request by ID

smc:requestIP.name: getPlanningRequestList
smc:requestIP.comment: Gets Planning Requests according to the given filter

smc:requestIP.name: getPlanningRequestStatus
smc:requestIP.comment: Gets the status of a Planning Request by ID. The Status is basically a State from the Planning Request Life Cycle.

smc:composite.name: PlanningRequestGroup
smc:composite.comment: This data structure defines a planning request group composite

smc:composite.name: PlanningRequest
smc:composite.comment: This data structure defines a planning request composite

smc:composite.name: PlanningRequestFilter
smc:composite.comment: This data structure defines a planning request filter composite

smc:composite.name: PlanningRequestUpdate
smc:composite.comment: This data structure defines a PlanningRequest Update composite

smc:field.name: counter
smc:field.comment: A counter used to distinguish the updates and to check the ordering.
